# Overall

This report uses census Microdata from IPUMS to look at internet access in the Louisville MSA. Data is available from 2013 to 2018 at the household level. Additional pages break down the data by poverty, race, and age.

```{r}
source('~/Documents/pers/ipums_internet_access/louisville.R')
```
